thread.section_title: Travelrepublic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelrepublic | www.travelrepublic.ie
thread.title: Mr Donnacha Kerins
thread.title_full: Travelrepublic reviewed by Mr Donnacha Kerins

author: Mr Donnacha Kerins
title: Mr Donnacha Kerins
text: Just back from Orlando and from flights to transfers to hotel we had no problems at all. When we booked our hotel was booked with Low Cost Beds which went out of business I immediately contacted Travel Republic who informed me that the booking with the hotel was now through them and to continue as normal. We arrived at our hotel and were checked in with no problems. Our transfers were on time and our flights were no problem either. For this holiday I would have to give them 5 ⭐️
